question: Which one of the following is the example of an artificial lake?
explanation:
Kodaikanal (Tamil Nadu)- Artificial Lake.
Kolleru Lake (Andhra Pradesh)- Largest freshwater lake of India between the deltas of the Krishna and Godavari rivers.
Nainital (Uttarakhand)- It is situated in the foothills of the Himalayas.
Renuka (Himachal Pradesh)- It is named after the goddess Renuka.
